name: Syncro
description:
Syncro: A mathematical game experience

Syncro is an immersive, soothing and brain-teasing experience.

This game challenges logical reasoning by the use of mathematics, conveying a graphical representation of a principle in the Automata Theory.

We invite you into a relaxing and meaningful reasoning experience, consisting of a minimal and colourful art-style, dynamic audio and a slowly fading particle system.

Arrange the shapes in a way that you can fill each container with them.
Your containers will be an abstract representation of geometric shapes (triangles, squares or pentagons).
Use the buttons to move your shapes. Their movement is indicated by the arrows on the screen.

This game has no timers or distractions. Sit back and relax.
